comment_sdk_config: This is the configuration file for the Web Components SDK

authConfig.authConfig_comment: authConfig is the block for authentication config entries
authConfig.authConfig_comment2: Optional Full paths to Infinity server OAuth endpoints (Only needed if using custom OAuth service)
authConfig.authConfig_comment3: Optional attributes are: authorize, token, revoke, authService, silentTimeout
authConfig.mashupClient_comment: Client ID from the OAuth 2.0 Client Registration record used for mashup use case
authConfig.mashupClient_comment2: See SDK Guide for instructions on how to generate and obtain the proper values for the following entries
authConfig.portalClientId_comment: Client ID from the OAuth 2.0 Client Registration record used for portal use case

serverConfig.comment_serverConfig: serverConfig is the block for SDK Content Server config entries
serverConfig.infinityRestServerUrl_comment: Full path to Infinity REST server
serverConfig.appAlias_comment: appAlias of the application which operators will be accessing (e.g., MediaCo)
serverConfig.sdkContentServerUrl_comment: If specified, the given URL will be used. If left blank, window.location.origin will be used.
serverConfig.locBootstrapCSS_comment: relative path to the Bootstrap CSS file to be used by the SDK components
serverConfig.appPortal_comment: If specified, the given appPortal will be loaded. If left blank, the operator's default Portal is used. Ignored for Mashup
